overview: Guy Juzang, President of Infinity Technology, Inc., has over 30 years of experience within the information technology industry. Mr. Juzang has been instrumental in every facet of the companyâ€™s development since its beginning in 1989, and has fostered its growth into the $10 million, award-winning, aerospace engineering company that it is today. Before founding Infinity, Mr. Juzang was Distribution Branch Manager at Digital Equipment Corporation (DEC), where he was responsible for managing a multi-state region that generated $5.6 million. He was also an Account Manager for local government and commercial accounts. Prior to DEC, Mr. Juzang served as a Systems Engineer at IBM. At IBM, he developed skills in software development, systems engineering, and sales and marketing within the information technology field, and was selected to attend the industryâ€™s most prestigious one-year training curriculum. Mr. Juzang received his MBA degree from New Mexico Highlands University, and also holds a bachelorâ€™s degree in sociology.
